Main moduleÂ¶

The main module contains the core classes of the library:

  • The Group class is designed to store and operate a dataset from a single XAFS scan.

  • The FitGroup class is designed to store a dataset from a fitted XAFS scan.

  • The Collection class is designed to store and operate on multiple group datasets.

  • The Report class provides a simple framework to print dataset information to sys.stdout.
